title: Nobel Peace Prize 2015: Pope Francis, Angela Merkel and John Kerry among possible laureates - live
text: Here are the latest updates: The five leading Nobel Peace Prize contenders Svetlana Alexievich has won the literature prize The chemistry prize was awarded to DNA scientists Physics work 'could change understanding of the universe' Anti-malaria drug wins Nobel Prize in Medicine
